languages.text: "Фиксирую ложь! Лорд-инквизитор разделял мою убежденность в необходимости ликвидации наследия Амарната. Он был призван в Простор Коронус лояльными членами флота Осознание, чтобы низложить Амарната. Это его войска атаковали "Герметико" в попытке истребить наше схизматическое творение!"

"I am registering a lie! The Lord Inquisitor shared my conviction that Amarnat's legacy had to be destroyed. He was summoned to the Koronus Expanse by loyal members of the Cognisance Fleet in order to depose Amarnat. It was his troops that attacked the Hermetico in an attempt to obliterate our schismatic creation!"
languages.original_text: "Фиксирую ложь! Лорд-инквизитор разделял мою убежденность в необходимости ликвидации наследия Амарната. Он был призван в Простор Коронус лояльными членами флота Осознание, чтобы низложить Амарната. Это его войска атаковали "Герметико" в попытке истребить наше схизматическое творение!"

He was summoned to the Koronus Expanse by loyal members of the Cognisance Fleet in order to depose Amarnat. It was his troops that attacked the Hermetico in an attempt to obliterate our schismatic creation!"
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: 「嘘を記録！ロード・インクィジターは、アマルナトの遺産を破壊すべきという、私の信念に賛同していた。彼はアマルナトの支配を脱するため、コグニサンス艦隊の忠実な人員に招かれてコロヌス・エクスパンスに出向いたのだ。私たち、分離派の作品を葬り去ろうとしてヘルメティコを攻撃したのがカルカサルの軍だ！」
languages.original_text: "I am registering a lie! The Lord Inquisitor shared my conviction that Amarnat's legacy had to be destroyed. He was summoned to the Koronus Expanse by loyal members of the Cognisance Fleet in order to depose Amarnat. It was his troops that attacked the Hermetico in an attempt to obliterate our schismatic creation!"

traits.locale_text: 「嘘を記録！ロード・インクィジターは、アマルナトの遺産を破壊すべきという、私の信念に賛同していた。彼はアマルナトの支配を脱するため、コグニサンス艦隊の忠実な人員に招かれてコロヌス・エクスパンスに出向いたのだ。私たち、分離派の作品を葬り去ろうとしてヘルメティコを攻撃したのがカルカサルの軍だ！」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “检测到谎言！大审判官与我一样，坚信阿玛纳特的遗产必须被摧毁。他被真理开拓者舰队的忠诚成员召唤到科罗努斯扩区，以推翻阿玛纳特。正是他的部队袭击了隐士之舟号，企图消灭这个引发分裂的造物！”
languages.original_text: "I am registering a lie! The Lord Inquisitor shared my conviction that Amarnat's legacy had to be destroyed. He was summoned to the Koronus Expanse by loyal members of the Cognisance Fleet in order to depose Amarnat. It was his troops that attacked the Hermetico in an attempt to obliterate our schismatic creation!"

traits.locale_text: “正在记录谎言！审判长与我一样，坚信阿玛纳特的遗产必须被摧毁。他被真理开拓者舰队的忠诚成员召唤到科罗努斯扩区，以推翻阿玛纳特。正是他的部队袭击了隐士之舟号，企图消灭这个引发分裂的造物！”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « Je détecte un mensonge ! Le seigneur inquisiteur a toujours partagé ma conviction que l'héritage d'Amarnat devait être détruit. Il a été convoqué dans les Étendues de Koronus par des membres loyaux de la Flotte de la Connaissance afin de destituer Amarnat. Ce sont ses troupes qui ont attaqué l'Hermetico dans l'espoir d'oblitérer notre création schismatique ! »
languages.original_text: "I am registering a lie! The Lord Inquisitor shared my conviction that Amarnat's legacy had to be destroyed. He was summoned to the Koronus Expanse by loyal members of the Cognisance Fleet in order to depose Amarnat. It was his troops that attacked the Hermetico in an attempt to obliterate our schismatic creation!"

traits.locale_text: « Mensonge détecté ! Le seigneur inquisiteur a toujours partagé ma conviction que l'héritage d'Amarnat devait être détruit. Il a été convoqué dans les Étendues de Koronus par des membres loyaux de la Flotte de la Connaissance afin de destituer Amarnat. Ce sont ses troupes qui ont attaqué l'Hermetico dans l'espoir d'oblitérer notre création schismatique ! »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «¡Mentira detectada! El Lord Inquisidor concordaba conmigo con que el legado de Amarnat debía destruirse. Miembros leales de la Flota Conciencia lo convocaron en la Extensión de Koronus para retirarle el poder a Amarnat. ¡Fueron sus tropas las que atacaron el Hermético con la intención de destruir nuestra creación cismática!».
languages.original_text: "I am registering a lie! The Lord Inquisitor shared my conviction that Amarnat's legacy had to be destroyed. He was summoned to the Koronus Expanse by loyal members of the Cognisance Fleet in order to depose Amarnat. It was his troops that attacked the Hermetico in an attempt to obliterate our schismatic creation!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Mentira detectada! El Lord Inquisidor concordaba conmigo con que el legado de Amarnat debía destruirse. Miembros leales de la Flota Conciencia lo convocaron en la Extensión de Koronus para retirarle el poder a Amarnat. ¡Fueron sus tropas las que atacaron el Hermético con la intención de destruir nuestra creación cismática!».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Ich registriere eine Lüge! Der Großinquisitor teilte meine Überzeugung, dass Amarnats Vermächtnis zerstört werden muss. Er wurde von treuen Mitgliedern der Erkenntnisflotte in die Koronus-Ausdehnung gerufen, um Amarnat zu stürzen. Es waren seine Truppen, die die Hermetico angegriffen haben, um unsere spalterische Schöpfung auszulöschen!"
languages.original_text: "I am registering a lie! The Lord Inquisitor shared my conviction that Amarnat's legacy had to be destroyed. He was summoned to the Koronus Expanse by loyal members of the Cognisance Fleet in order to depose Amarnat. It was his troops that attacked the Hermetico in an attempt to obliterate our schismatic creation!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich verzeichne eine Lüge! Der Großinquisitor teilte meine Überzeugung, dass Amarnats Vermächtnis zerstört werden muss. Er wurde von treuen Mitgliedern der Erkenntnisflotte in die Koronus-Ausdehnung gerufen, um Amarnat zu stürzen. Es waren seine Truppen, die die Hermetico angegriffen haben, um unsere spalterische Schöpfung auszulöschen!"
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Yalan söylendiğini kaydediyorum! Amarnat'ın mirasının yok edilmesi gerektiği konusundaki kanaatimi Lord Engizisyoncu da paylaşıyordu. Malumat Filosu'nun sadık mensuplarınca Koronus Enginliği'ne çağrılma sebebi, Amarnat'tan kurtulmaktı. Bölücü yaratımımızı yok etmek adına Hermetico'ya saldıranlar da onun birlikleriydi!"
languages.original_text: "I am registering a lie! The Lord Inquisitor shared my conviction that Amarnat's legacy had to be destroyed. He was summoned to the Koronus Expanse by loyal members of the Cognisance Fleet in order to depose Amarnat. It was his troops that attacked the Hermetico in an attempt to obliterate our schismatic creation!"

traits.locale_text: "Bir yalan kaydediyorum! Amarnat'ın mirasının yok edilmesi gerektiği konusundaki kanaatimi Lord Engizisyoncu da paylaşıyordu. Malumat Filosu'nun sadık üyelerince Koronus Enginliği'ne çağrılma sebebi Amarnat'tan kurtulmaktı. Bölücü yaratımımızı yok etmek adına Hermetico'ya saldıran birlikler onundu!"
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
